mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_alarm (board_id) /* 공지사항 번호 */ VALUES (#{boardId})
mapper.select:
SELECT '알림' AS category_name, /* 알림 카테고리 이름 */ IF (b.create_date >= DATE(NOW()) - INTERVAL #{newDay} DAY, TRUE, FALSE) AS new_status, /* 신규 상태 */
FROM (SELECT board_id FROM notice_alarm ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{limit}) a JOIN board b ON b.board_id = a.board_id JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY b.create_date DESC
